SqlServer.Query: SELECT r.rst_cod_tienda AS clientId, CONCAT(LEFT(rcd.variableV, CHARINDEX(':', rcd.variableV) - 1),'') AS servidor, CONCAT('MAXPOINT_',r.rst_cod_tienda) AS repository, 'sis_despliegue' AS [user], '81Nb1852g7@YP3t' AS password FROM RestauranteColeccionDeDatos rcd INNER JOIN Restaurante r ON r.rst_id=rcd.rst_id INNER JOIN Cadena c ON c.cdn_id=r.cdn_id INNER JOIN ColeccionRestaurante cr ON cr.cdn_id=c.cdn_id AND cr.ID_ColeccionRestaurante=rcd.ID_ColeccionRestaurante WHERE rcd.variableV LIKE '%:880' AND r.IDStatus = config.fn_estado('Restaurante', 'Activo') ORDER BY r.rst_cod_tienda
